name: Which Game Was I Playing?
description:
Which game was I playing? Inspired by modern multi-game randomizers, this game begins as a familiar puzzle game, but sporadically shifts to a different game sharing the same board. Plan your moves to succeed not only at this game, but also which game it will become in the future.

Submission for GMTK Game Jam 2020 - Out of Control - solo developed in 48h!
